id.description: The unique ID of the application property. The ID is the same as the key.

key.description: The key identifier of the application property. The key is the same as the ID.

value.description: The new value assigned to the application property.

name.description: The name or title of the application property.

desc.description: The description of the application property.

type.description: The data type (e.g., string, number) of the application property.

defaultValue.description: The default value of the application property.

example.description: An example or sample value for the application property.

allowedValues.description: The allowed values for the application property, if applicable.
